attributes.action: Bring the English Electric Lightning into airshow service in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many poeple who go to airshows reguarly would remeber the Lighning. This was well known for the niose it made when flying over. I believe that this aircraft should be allowed to be used in airshows once more. Please sign if you agree.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
